page.title: 18The Arts in Nantwich
page.content: The Nantwich amateur theatrical tradition thrives and recently the {"Nantwich Players"}acquired a modest building and quite uniquely transformed it into a 100 seat theatre Their season of plays caters for young and old. A theatre club extends the 'theatre-goers' interests. The{Nantwich Choral Society}provide wonderful concerts each year.Also for the music enthusiast,there is an Orchestral Society, a Music Circle, the Acton Operatic and Music Workshops for the young and Brass Band ensembles in both High schools. Being steeped in history, the Historical and Family History Society thrive in Nantwich.Less taxing is the choice of films shown at the local film society.{The St.Mary's Tapestry Group recently completed a large embroidered curtain for the west wall.
